EmailTemplate.name: Event Waitlisted
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name} ,
Thank you so much for registering your interest to attend {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c}.
We've been overwhelmed with expressions of interest for this event and at this stage, we unfortunately don't have any places available.
However, we will keep you on the waitlist and if any families are no longer able to attend, we'll be sure to notify you as soon as possible.
We hope to see your family on one of our fun-filled resilience building programs soon.
Kind Regards,
